question: Distinguish between somatic and germ-line mutations.

sample_answer.full_answer: Somatic mutations occur in body cells and are not heritable, whereas germ-line mutations occur in gametes and are heritable (2 marks).

marking_criteria.criteria: Distinguishes between the two types of mutations in terms of the cells they affect.
Distinguishes between the two types of mutations in terms of their heritability.
